title: Swan Motif Ruby & Pearl Gutapusalu Haram - Royal Heritage
materials: Natural Freshwater Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite haram showcases a central swan motif pendant, symbolizing love and harmony, adorned with brilliant cabochon cut rubies. The pendant incorporates traditional Gutapusalu tassels, crafted with delicate ruby and pearl beading, creating a graceful cascading effect. The double-layered chain consists of alternating pearls and ruby accents, enhancing the piece's regal appearance. Meticulously handcrafted with attention to detail, reflecting the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry.
colors: Pearl (Lustrous White). A traditional and timeless color palette.
description: This haram is not just jewelry; it's an heirloom. The swan motif holds significant cultural meaning, making it a perfect gift for a bride or a cherished addition to any jewelry collection. The superior craftsmanship ensures durability, while the timeless design ensures lasting appeal. The use of high-quality rubies and pearls adds to its value and beauty. A true statement piece showcasing Hyderabadi artistry.
